tool_description: Creates detailed corrective action plans for identified safety hazards with timelines, responsibilities, and resource requirements.

hazard_ids.description: List of hazard identifiers requiring correction

risk_levels.description: Risk level for each hazard: low, medium, high, or critical

interim_measures.description: Whether interim protective measures are needed

equipment_procurement.description: Whether new equipment procurement is needed

error_messages: Mismatched array lengths: hazard_ids and risk_levels must have equal length
Invalid risk level: Must be one of [low, medium, high, critical]
Invalid budget: Budget must be positive number
Invalid date format: Use ISO 8601 date-time format
Past target date: Target completion date cannot be in the past
usage: Input hazard details and planning constraints to generate comprehensive corrective action plans with prioritized timelines and resource allocation.

action_plan_id.description: Unique identifier for the action plan

total_actions.description: Total number of corrective actions planned

estimated_cost.description: Total estimated cost for all actions

projected_completion.description: Projected completion date for all actions
